reference.description: The Swipref, a unique id in Swipload

statusId.description: Enum for Freight statuses that can be updated by external systems.
statusId.title: ExternalUpdateFreightStatusCode

signee.description: Name of person signing for pickup/delivery (Optional)

fileName.description: Name of the file including extension

fileContentType.description: MIME content type of the file. If omitted, it will be inferred from the file extension.

fileContentBase64.description: File content encoded as a Base64 string. Do not include the Data URI prefix (e.g. "data:image/png;base64,").

documentData.description: A document encoded in Base64 for upload
documentData.title: DocumentBase64Dto

schema.description: Request to update the status of a freight
